CellarScience offers high quality yeast and other fermentation products at reasonable prices. CellarScience believes dry yeast is the future of brewing. Liquid yeast does not ship well, often has cell counts well below the stated values, needs oxygenation and often requires a starter which ...

For years liquid yeast has been sold as the higher quality option but times are changing. Yes, 20 years ago dry yeast was made by bread yeast producers and the quality was not as good as liquid yeast. CellarScience is helping to flip that script with the release of five high quality dry yeasts.
